'''Survivor of Catastrophe''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Thundering Fury]].

==Description==
The lost feather of the Thunderbird enchanted in purple lightning.<br />It serves as the last witness of the destruction of the tribe.

The ancient tribe held the Thunderbird as its protector.<br />But it rained down thunder upon the tribe.<br />On one gloomy night, it shared a pure friendship with the lad.<br />Once it departed, the lad picked up the feather it dropped.

"I shall sing you another tune,<br />When you come again with thunder and rain."

Driven to madness by the remorse of a promise unkept,<br />The Thunderbird left the [[Mt. Kanna|mountain]] in cinders.<br />It was hunted down years after, slain as a monster.

Years passed, the [[Tsurumi Island|burned land]] revitalized.<br />The lightning-feather was left buried in the vegetation.<br />The story of the Thunderbird and the young lad had all but perished with the tribe.
